subtitle.zh: 由 Rspack 驱动的构建工具

slogan.zh: 在瞬息之间构建你的 web 应用

rspackBasedDesc.en: Using Rspack to bring you the ultimate development experience.
rspackBasedDesc.zh: 享受 Rspack 带来的极致开发体验。

batteriesIncludedDesc.en: Out-of-the-box integration with the most practical building features in the ecosystem.
batteriesIncludedDesc.zh: 集成生态中最实用的构建功能。

frameworkAgnosticDesc.en: Supports React, Vue, Svelte, and more frameworks.

deepOptimizationDesc.en: Automatically optimize static assets to maximizing production performance.
deepOptimizationDesc.zh: 自动优化静态资源，最大化生产性能。

highlyPluggableDesc.en: Comes with a lightweight plugin system and a set of high quality plugins.
highlyPluggableDesc.zh: 提供轻量级插件系统和一系列高质量插件。

easyToConfigureDesc.en: Start with zero configuration and everything is configurable.
easyToConfigureDesc.zh: 以零配置启动，然后一切皆可配置。

toolStackDesc.en: High-performance tool stack built around Rspack to boost modern web development
toolStackDesc.zh: 围绕 Rspack 打造的高性能工具栈，助力现代 Web 开发

benchmarkDesc.en: Combining Rust and TypeScript with a parallelized architecture to bring you the ultimate developer experience
benchmarkDesc.zh: 基于 Rust 和 TypeScript 的高度并行、增量编译架构，构建性能极佳，带来极致的开发体验。
